identity._help: CURRENTLY DISPLAYED - Edit any value below
identity.headline: Strategy Consultant turned AI Researcher/Builder. I love building things and helping people. Very active on X.
identity.about: I enjoy designing and scaling digital strategies that enable businesses to transform with Agentic AI. I'm passionate about connecting analytics, automation, and human creativity to solve complex problems and turn data into a strategic advantage.

projects._help: PROJECT 1 - With YouTube video. Remove TODO: to show. Add image: /public/projects/project1.png
projects.title: AI Layer on Google Maps dataset
projects.description: Google Maps sits on a goldmine of real-world user behavior data — it could evolve into a personalized automated travel assistant so good that your life outside home depends on it. Imagine simply asking: “What should I do next?” Built a quick prototype called NextSpot, exploring this idea with the help of Google Maps API and Vertex AI LLM..

projects._help: PROJECT 2 - With static image. Remove TODO: to show. Add image: /public/projects/project2.png
projects.title: Small Language Model using AWS Bedrock
projects.description: What if your business reports could answer: “What did you get done this week?”

projects._help: PROJECT 3 - No media. Remove TODO: to show.
projects.title: AI Benchmarks testing agent using Datadog
projects.description: Everyone’s racing to ship agents. The differentiator will be operating them safely. After watching a discussion on why we need new AI benchmarks, Built LLM Reliability & Security Sentinel: chaos tests agent failure modes (latency, errors, token/cost spikes, security), and Datadog auto-creates a Case/Incident. This kind of telemetry is how we’ll build production benchmarks for agent deployments.

hackathons._help: HACKATHON 1 - Remove TODO: to show. Add image: /public/hackathons/hack1.png
hackathons.title: AI Partner Catalyst: Accelerate Innovation by Google Cloud and Datadog
hackathons.description: AI Benchmarks testing agent using Datadog to perform chaos testing on LLM-based agents and auto-create incidents in Datadog for any failures detected.
